resources.string: Swipe Left and Right for more options
The actions below will become available once the connection with the device has been set, and the device is in \'Ready\' state

Open LiveView (for short OLV) is an OpenSource application with the purpose of providing a true OpenSource application stack for the interaction between a LiveView device and an Android device via Bluetooth and improve the communication and usability between the two. Open LiveView is made available under the Apache License, Version 2.0 . If you wish to learn more about the Apache license visit http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html .\n This project is currently maintained by Pedro Veloso ( pedronveloso@androidpt.com ) and Boombuler but you too are free to contribute in any way you can, if you wish to do so visit https://github.com/pedronveloso/OpenLiveView for the project sources and related. You\'re also free to join the conversation over that XDA Forum on LiveView here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1422106
